interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information === Product Title: Laser Hair Removal Painless Device for Women and Men with FDA Cleared Upgraded to 999,999 Flashes Ice Cooling Permanent Reduction in Hair Regrowth at Home for Whole Body Armpits Legs Arms Review Date: 2022/08/12 Store: BESTEK Product Description: ["Do you find it troublesome to use shaves shaving every day? Does the regrowth of body hair bother you? BESTEK IPL Electric Laser Hair Removal Machine is a personal home beauty treatment device, allowing you to have smooth and flawless skin like silk. Our products have expert-level high-safety FDA mark, which will avoid the pain of waxing and depilatory, and will not leave scars. It can be used on the face and body of men and women, such as chin, lips, beard, eyebrows or neck, pubic bone, hands, legs, bikini line, back area. Are you afraid of scars from burns? The best bestek epilator is produced with professional ice-cold technology, allowing you to enjoy a painless permanent hair removal salon, avoiding burn and sensitive redness. Smart IPL system can slow hair growth or even end, reduce skin wrinkles and aging, and achieve skin protection. Set the automatic mode to send out intense pulses with frequency. Manual mode can be used in a small area like a pen-shaped epilator. NOTE that the depilator can be used for adults with black or brown dark hair. If you hair dyed in red, blue and other colors, ironing or have acne, tattoos, moles, spots, please read the instructions before use. Kids should not use and it can’t be washed with water.Please use facial cleanser, makeup remover or soap to clean and dry the use area before use, and then trim the hair and shave with a trimmer or razors, no need to wax or apply cream, aloe vera gel, lotion, moisturizer, sunscreen. Wear your glasses and take care of your eyes when using it to prevent flash light. Bestek's portable mini hair removal tool can be taken to travel. The cool white body case and golden top can also be given to ladies as gifts. The accessories of kit includes a shaver and is delivered by Amazon. Buy Bestek new epilator and enjoy stress-free depilacion. Let your leg shine like stars at nigh this summer."] Average Rating: 3.3 Product Details: {'Product Dimensions': '7.48 x 2.4 x 1.18 inches; 1.39 Pounds', 'Item model number': 'BTJL068'} Review Text: Reviewed by spouse:

I have delayed doing this review to be able to use this multiple times to see how well it responds. I think it’s actually making a difference I have been waiting at least four weeks between each time I use it on my legs and the hair on my legs is definitely coming in less and less. If you have done hair removal procedures in the past, you know that it takes a lot of time and you must follow the hair growth process and this could take up to six months to a year to get the results that you want. I would say that patience prevails…they usually do work whether it’s a laser hair removal process or using one of these little devices at home, it just takes time. Review Title: Works pretty well, just takes time (months) to see real results Rating: 5.0 --------------------------------------------------
reference_summary:
Moyo Natural Labs 9 Piece 2 Oz Premium HDPE Travel Size bottle Reusable Travel Bottle Kit And Travel Jars With Fine Mist Spray Bottle BPA FREE travel accessories for women TSA Approved 2oz 59 ml MoYo Natural Labs {'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '4 x 4 x 4 inches; 1 Pounds', 'Item model number': '2OZHDPEWHITE9PC', 'Manufacturer': 'MoYo Natural Labs'} This is an excellent set of small travel bottles!

They are well constructed, and so far have not leaked a drop. I am confident in using these with any liquids; the last thing you want is leakage, and I do not expect to have any with this set.

You get nine vessels to hold liquids with the set: 1 spary bottle, 3 squeeze bottles, and 5 small twist cap bottles.

For an inexpensive set, this one really covers all of the bases. Highly recommended! Excellent travel set for the money! YinMer Lavish Lash – Eyelash Growth Enhancer & Brow Serum with Biotin & Natural Growth Peptides for Long, Thick Lashes and Eyebrows OUZIFISH {'Package Dimensions': '6.61 x 2.8 x 1.26 inches; 3.53 Ounces'} Review provided by spouse:

I’m excited to see the results from this growth serum. I over plucked my eyebrows, so hoping to grow a few hairs back in. I will update this post when I have more to share. Very nice packaging! Jury is out, but hopeful Ice Roller for Face & Eye by Charmlily, Puffiness, Migraine, Pain Relief - Cold Facial Massager Treatment to Reduce Puffy Face & Tighten Pores, Under Eye Wrinkles (Pink) CHARMLILY {'Brand': 'CHARMLILY', 'Special Feature': 'Heat', 'Water Resistance Level': 'Not Water Resistant', 'Package Dimensions': '7.8 x 3.54 x 2.48 inches; 6.35 Ounces', 'UPC': '679360098356', 'Manufacturer': 'CHARMLILY'} Review provided by spouse:

This is a fun new tool to try. It was bigger than I thought it would be...picture included for reference. Works as intended (don't expect miracles, but overall very good). Great roller! Travel Bottles for Toiletries, Silicone Travel Size Bottles And Squeezable Containers Holders with belt clip Keychain for Backpack, Shampoo, Liquid, Cosmetic Products(2 oz, 6 Pack) MACRAY {'Brand': 'MACRAY', 'Material': 'Silicone', 'Capacity': '2 Ounces', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Package Dimensions': '11.73 x 6.61 x 1.61 inches; 8.47 Ounces', 'UPC': '782938308006'} These are a fun addition to my travel items when it’s safe to travel again. They all came individually wrapped, are squeezeable and a tight seal. Good overall quality. Love 'em! Facial Cleansing Brush made with Ultra Hygienic Soft Silicone 4-PACK HAMUULL {'Product Dimensions': '2.76 x 1.97 x 0.08 inches; 0.32 Ounces', 'UPC': '779683799654', 'Manufacturer': 'HAMUULL'} These are so fun...I have one at my sink, one in the shower, one in my travel case and an extra. These fine little scrubbers are now replacing using an apricot scrub that is pretty harsh after using these. I highly recommend! The colors are cute too! Great little scrubbers! YISIBIA Nipple Covers For Women Disposable Self-Adhesive Satin Nipple Stickers Petals Breast Pasties 40 Pairs (light beige) YSB YISIBIA {'Color': 'Light Beige', 'Brand': 'YSB YISIBIA', 'Material': 'Satin', 'Fit Type': 'Skinny', 'Pattern': 'Solid', 'Package Dimensions': '7.87 x 4.29 x 0.55 inches; 1.76 Ounces', 'Department': 'womens', 'Manufacturer': 'YSB YISIBIA'} Review MOST DEFINITELY provided this review:

I have used these type of nipple covers in the past and loved them. They come in really handy in the summer with items that are a challenge to wear even with a strapless bra. This pack comes with tons of the covers...some are pedal shaped and some are round, so will last multiple seasons.  I tend to reuse mine until they lose their stickiness they don’t smell or anything. Works great and can even reuse Organic Self Tanner for Face and Body - Streak Free Sunless Tanner - Self Tanning Lotion with Manuka Honey and Aloe Vera - Fake Tan for Fair to Medium Skin - Indoor Tanning Lotion with Bronzer (8oz) DermaChange {'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '8 x 3 x 2 inches; 8 Ounces', 'UPC': '860004819929'} Review by spouse:

I really like this self tanner. I have been using jergens for years, but this seems to pack a better punch and works quickly and seems to be cumulative. I didn’t find it to be orangey, but was conscious to not put too much around my knees, elbows and ankles since these types of products tend to get a little darker in those areas and can kind of go orangey quickly. Love the tanner! Foot Peel Mask Coconut - For Cracked Heels, Dead Skin Calluses - Removes & Repairs Rough Heels, Dry Feet, Make Your Feet Baby Soft - Natural Exfoliating Peeling Foot Mask 3 Pairs HUALIJIA {'Brand': 'HUALIJIA', 'Scent': 'Coconut', 'Skin Type': 'Dry', 'Unit Count': '3.00 Count', 'Number of Items': '6', 'Package Dimensions': '6.69 x 4.92 x 1.22 inches; 6.38 Ounces'} Reviewed by spouse:

I have used these peels before so I’m familiar with the peeling process. I was very surprised when I had used a similar one of these for the first time and my feet peeled for weeks. Since I had done in the last 6 mo., and I have regular pedicures, my feet did not peel too bad and this actually had a much better scent than the other one I ordered so I highly recommend this one. Great mask product LICHEE SU Creamy Lipstick,Matte Finish, Lip Makeup,Modern Creamy Soft Moisturizing Lip Color,Lightweight and Rich Velvet Texture,Nude, Pink, Red,Long-lasting High Impact Lipcolor,0.14 Oz LICHEE SU {'Brand': 'LICHEE SU', 'Color': '06#Rose Purple', 'Skin Type': 'Normal', 'Item Form': 'Cream', 'Finish Type': 'Matte', 'Product Dimensions': '0.98 x 0.98 x 3.22 inches; 1.26 Ounces', 'Manufacturer': 'LICHEE SU', 'Country of Origin': 'China'} Reviewed by spouse:

This is the prettiest color lipstick for my skin tone. To me, the color is a pink cinnamon. It provides me with a hint of color but not being overpowering and looking like an “over make up” look. It’s a go to every day lip color and a good color if you were going to have some heavy eye make m-up out for an evening. I found it very moisturizing and just a good color to have in my arsenal of lipsticks. Very nice lipstick Reusable Self-Adhesive Eyelashes DIKAYI {'Color': 'Black', 'Brand': 'DIKAYI', 'Material Feature': 'Natural', 'Item Form': 'Pair', 'Mounting Type': 'Eyelash Glue', 'Package Dimensions': '8.11 x 3.62 x 0.67 inches; 2.08 Ounces'} Reviewed by spouse:

Reviewed by spouse:

OMG…these are great! I never wear fake lashes because I don’t wanna deal with the glue I can never get the right amount on there and it just looks terrible so I never wear them. I had heard about these and thought I would give them a shot and they are amazing. I think you can get multiple wears out of each set because they seem pretty sticky. I think I might trim mine down like by a couple of lashes (width lengthwise) but I do have kind of smaller eyes. The length of the lashes were great and were fine with wearing my glasses so they would be fine with sunglasses as well Fabulous! profile:
**Updated User Profile Summary:**

- **Product Focus**: The user's interest in personal care products now includes innovative at-home beauty treatments, reflecting a growing appreciation for advanced solutions that simplify and enhance grooming routines.

- **Preference for Quality**: The user continues to prioritize effective self-care tools that provide consistent performance, underscoring their commitment to high-quality, reliable products.

- **Value for Money**: Their purchasing decisions emphasize economic practicality, favoring multifunctional products that deliver effective, affordable beauty solutions.

- **TSA Approval**: An ongoing interest in travel-friendly personal care items is evident, maintaining a focus on convenience without sacrificing wellness considerations.

- **Rating Tendencies**: The user tends to rate products highly when they meet expectations, indicating a discerning selection process and overall satisfaction with their choices.

- **Material Awareness**: There is a strong emphasis on using safe and effective materials, showcasing a commitment to comfort and health-conscious standards in their skincare and cosmetic selections.

- **Patience in Results**: Recent experiences with hair removal devices demonstrate the user's understanding of the gradual nature of results in beauty treatments, indicating an informed and realistic approach to personal care.

Overall, the user’s profile highlights a thoughtful and evolving approach to personal care and cosmetics, emphasizing functionality, economic sensibility, and a commitment to wellness that complements their active lifestyle.
